TopicTitle: Create The UNSC infinity with realistic porportions (STOCK O

Articles.Content:
I challenge someone to create the UNSC infinity from halo 4... and make it hold small frigates inside and have at least 4 hangars and docking bays like the one in halo. Also, don't forget to add the mainsails (And a download for the craft is required). (STOCK ONLY) I created the cruiser from killzone 3, but I'd like to see how you guys can build these ships. For example, I'll add my own replica of a sci-fi ship:

Edited August 2, 2013 by andrew123

i'd recommend you file this in rocket builders

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forumdisplay.php/52-Rocket-Builders
As a part of Zokesia, I could be able to make this one myself... so I'll see to it.

I made a Infinity that carries frigates. Here is the link to it.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/unsc-infinity/

Also, I've seen your infinity that you are working on, and I'm impressed with its size.

Here is the link to my ship

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/unsc-infinity/

Nice ship. :) I actually decided to make a km + sized infinity class, but I might have to make it long term due to computer melting lag...

One of ONI's black projects. Major changes have occurred to both the ships and frigates since this post to increase ship length to about 2.2 km.

The Infinity is also progressing along. This is just the bottom section for the frigates.
